channel.title: YOLO on Le Hoang Vu
channel.description: Recent content in YOLO on Le Hoang Vu

item.title: License Plate Recognition
item.description:
Github Repository: License-Plate-Recognition

Summary

  • Use openCV and easyOCR to read text from license plate in a car detected by YOLO
  • Train YOLO on a custom dataset to create model that can detect license plate easily (get the data here)
  • The video I used in this project can be downloaded here.
  • You can see the result below:

Steps you should follow if you want to do the same:

  • Clone this repo into your local computer and open it in your IDE
  • Download the license plate detector model here
  • Clone this repo and put it into the folder you have cloned
  • Execute main.py to create output.csv, then add_missing_data to generate test_interpolated.csv
  • To have a csv file named out2.csv, you should sort test_interpolated.csv by “frame_nmr” column and save in your local.
  • Last, you run visualize.py to see the results.
  • Good Luck!
